meanings.sent1: The wedded couple celebrated their anniversary with a romantic dinner.
meanings.sent2: The newly wedded pair exchanged vows in a beautiful ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The wedded duo danced joyfully at their wedding reception.
meanings.sent4: Their love was like a wedded bond that could not be broken.
meanings.sent5: The wedded partners held hands and smiled at each other lovingly.

meanings.definition: Devoted or attached to a particular pursuit or way of life
meanings.sent1: She was wedded to her passion for painting, spending hours in her studio.
meanings.sent2: The musician was wedded to his guitar, playing it every day without fail.
meanings.sent3: He was so wedded to his favorite TV show that he never missed an episode.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her work was wedded to her strong work ethic.
meanings.sent5: The chef was wedded to creating new and innovative dishes for his restaurant.
